scripts.build-css: node-sass-chokidar src/ --output-style compressed --include-path src --include-path node_modules/patternfly-react/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/patternfly/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/font-awesome-sass/assets/stylesheets -o src/
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ --output-style compressed --include-path src --include-path node_modules/patternfly-react/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/patternfly/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/font-awesome-sass/assets/stylesheets -o src/ --watch --recursive
